title: 3-Bedroom close to Wollaston Beach!
map_address: Furnace Brook Parkway near Southern Artery
posting_body: Check out this beautiful 3 bed 1 bath available for rent September 15th!
Ideal for the active person who is looking for close proximity to the beach, water, Quincy Center, and Boston!
This unit is adorable with a living room and dining room and eat in kitchen along with 3 bedrooms!
Hardwood floors throughout, laundry on site, storage in basement and directly across the street from furnace brook - ideal for kayakers!
Not far from the Quincy Center T station, and an easy commute to Boston.
Credit check required - must have good credit over 700 please.
Small dog (under 20 lbs) may be considered, 1 cat ok.
Move in costs - First, security and a 1/2-month broker fee (2.5 months upfront), there is also a $250 nonrefundable cleaning fee with the unit.
